CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISNULL(Lawyers__c), Lawyers__c = 0 ), NULL, IF( Lawyers__c <= 83, "Attorney Band: 50-83", IF( Lawyers__c <= 167, "Attorney Band: 100-167", IF( Lawyers__c <= 500, "Attorney Band: 233-500", IF( Lawyers__c <= 1200, "Attorney Band: 600-1200", IF( Lawyers__c <= 2000, "Attorney Band: 1400-2000", "Attorney Band: 2500 - up" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: License Band Category
